price: 106. Kai jų brolis Nūhas (Nojus) sakė jiems: „Argi jūs nebijosite Allaho ir nepaklusite Jam?“
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
